lead_paragraph: Lionel Messi will not chase a second Olympic football gold medal at the Rio de Janeiro Games in August, Argentina coach Gerardo Martino said on Monday.

headline.main: Messi Will Not Play at Rio Olympics, Says Argentina Coach
headline.print_headline: Messi Will Not Play at Rio Olympics, Says Argentina Coach

snippet: Lionel Messi will not chase a second Olympic football gold medal at the Rio de Janeiro Games in August, Argentina coach Gerardo Martino said on Monday.
